entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:54AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A Strong Storm Moves Through the Panhandle This Weekend... A gale force low with a significant source of tropical moisture will enter the Gulf of Alaska Saturday. This system will bring moderate to heavy rain and windy conditions to the Panhandle Saturday and Sunday.
